Name: Silver-haired Echo Trainer - II
Description: Grandpa Jingzhu has come up with a new method to train Echoes. Go and ask him about the details.
QuestDesc: Grandpa Jingzhu has come up with a new method to train Echoes. Go and ask him about the details.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’ve heard rumors that Yhan has turned into quite the strict instructor. You’d better take care.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There are quite a few juniors in there who were once beaten hard by me, haha! So, I’ll refrain from joining you and spoiling their spirits.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here we are. Go on in. Wish you good luck!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now that we’re all here, Grandpa Jingzhu, what’s the plan?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since our last parting, I’ve been pondering over Linghan’s words, and they’ve offered me a new perspective!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: “If you’re aiming to become an Echo Master, you can’t judge an Echo solely from its appearance. Take this Carapace, for instance. Despite its imposing scythes, it may not what it seems.”

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She believed that the Scythes are only imposing on the surface, yet lacking in practicality and sharpness as weapons.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’m sure if I can hone these scythes to blade-like sharpness, Linghan will gladly accept my Noctemint.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One improves with practice. We’ll know the answer once I try.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem, life is full of uncertainties. If I fail this time, there’s always another chance!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright then, let’s set to sharpening these giant scythes!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Um... Speaking of the Echo training grounds...

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, that’d be Instructor Yhan’s training grounds! I’ve been there before for the Patroller Graduation Assessment. Honestly, if I can help it, I’d rather not go for round two.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem, but with {PlayerName} by our side today, it won’t be so nerve-wracking, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Being timid doesn’t fit being a Patroller! Follow my lead. Let’s roll!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Back so soon?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yhan is quite a formidable figure. Breezing through his training is truly commendable.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have no doubt that the world will soon be at your feet, youngsters!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, enough banter. Let’s get down to the business first. The scythes of the Havoc Warrior await our sharpening!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Back here again, in this familiar spot.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Grandpa Jingzhu, you’re here to see Grandma, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I heard you're... um, what's the word? Courting Grandma?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh my! Hold on, Yingying. You’re too young to understand what that means.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I even learned a new term! Late-life love!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, Grandpa, you should go for it! I’ll go tell Grandma you’re here!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: GRANDMA!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Grandpa Jingzhu is back with more Noctemints for you, Grandma!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh my, oh my, kids these days are something else.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Noctemints?

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It’s strange. Lately, about ten gentlemen have brought me Noctemints.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It’s twelve.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And now I'm the thirteenth one... Hold on, those before were all me too…

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Remember what you told me last time? One can’t judge an Echo solely from its appearance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That actually makes perfect sense! So I’ve honed these scythes even sharper!

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can interpret it that way.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What a relief to hear that! Alright, let me present to you what we’ve managed to achieve this time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What do you think, Linghan?

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry, what was the reason for your visit again? Ah, to show me the Echo?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingying
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: NO! Grandma, he’s here to give you Noctemints!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yingying seems to be quite lively today, and that helped me a lot.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yingying is certainly brimming with energy today, isn’t she? That helped me a lot.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I suppose I should seize this opportunity. Yes, that’s right. I did come to bring you Noctemints. Would you like to spend the rest of your life with me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh dear, this is quite the headache. Thank you, but I'm not presently interested in seeking a partner. Even if I were, I'd prefer someone akin to my former lover...

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He was a wise and valiant soldier, and even his Echoes were impressive. Compared to him, everyone else falls short.

Dialogues.Speaker: Linghan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, feel free to ask me anything Echo-related, but let’s keep everything else off the table.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, then... Sorry to bother you. I shall take my leave.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It seems Grandpa Jingzhu was rejected again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Grandpa Jingzhu, are you okay? Please don’t be sad... I-I’ll do everything I can to cheer you up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm? Sad? Not in the slightest! Even if I were, it’d be but a mere act.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thirteen failures down, but I’m not about to throw in the towel! I’ll persist, be it the fourteenth, fifteenth, or beyond...

Options.PlotLineKey: Why are you suddenly fired up?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For I’ve resolved to become the wise and valiant soldier that matches Linghan’s ideals!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I feel bad for rendering your efforts futile.

Options.PlotLineKey: As long as you’re not stingy about the payment.
It was quite amusing to watch all of this unfold.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you. You two are really kind-hearted!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don’t worry. I’ll ensure you receive adequate compensation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, this is a little embarrassing... Still, being happy is good for your health, right? At least I made someone happy. It’s not too terrible.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, this is a little embarrassing... Still, being happy is good for your health, right? At least I made someone happy. It’s not too terrible.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thirteen consecutive rejections... Perhaps it’s time for some introspection on my approach...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perhaps, Linghan isn’t used to such direct and impassioned displays of affection?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That makes sense... Grandma Linghan does seem rather serious, so perhaps it’s time to switch tactics?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... What alternative approach should I try?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That’s a great idea! Start by engaging her in a topic that grabs her attention, and you might find yourself getting closer to her. Then, asking her to be your partner might just fall into place naturally!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed, it seems Echoes are the only thing that captures her interest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’ll have to think carefully about how to improve the Echo. Actually, my captain taught me a lot back in the day, but age has dulled my memory.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, let’s call it a day. I need to go home and think it over. Here, this is your payment for today’s efforts.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not bad. Far beyond my expectations.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, you never fail to impress me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don’t hesitate to come to me if you need help. I’d be happy to provide training at different levels for enthusiastic people like you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, that sounds a tad... intimidating, doesn't it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I never imagined we’d breeze through all that training so quickly! You’re truly living up to your name, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let’s go break the good news to Grandpa Jingzhu!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa! It’s even more impressive now! Check out those scythes—they’re seriously intimidating!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Despite your youthful vigor, enduring Yhan’s training again in such a brief span may still be quite a challenge. Maybe, we can...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This voice... I knew it's you, Mr. Jingzhu.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In-Instructor Yhan?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, you still recognize this old face, Yhan.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You two know each other?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We do and for a long time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the days of the Midnight Rangers, Mr. Jingzhu commanded my utmost respect.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It’s been a while since we last met. Mr. Jingzhu. You still look spirited... though your legs don’t seem as nimble?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem, just a minor accident. You see, I’m getting on in years. A little slip while hiking. Nothing to worry about!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’ve been resting and should recover soon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your injuries seem to have healed well, but don’t underestimate the importance of rest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You’re as talkative as ever, boy. Back in the day, we endured far worse and still fought valiantly in battles. Remember?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But you have retired for a long time...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Retired I may be, but the fire still burns within me! It’s been quite some time since I retired, and opportunities to mingle with you youngsters are rare these days.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And here stands Chief Instructor Yhan. You’ve been keeping well, I trust?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’m merely fulfilling my duty. And how fare your old comrades?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Except for Captain and myself, they all... Ah, never mind. Let’s focus on happier topics during this once-in-a-while reunion.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The past is the past. When you reach my age, you’ll realize that the present moment holds the most significance in life!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Live in the moment and cherish each passing day. That’s how we honor our comrades’ sacrifices.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed, Mr. Jingzhu. The present demands our full attention.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Exactly, then let’s talk about the present. You know what I need now. Are you willing to lend a hand?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You’re as spirited as ever, Mr. Jingzhu.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, I’m truly flattered.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yhan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These should be enough for your needs. Take them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great, thanks.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Instructor Yhan doesn’t seem half as evil as the rumors make him out to be.

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’m still surprised at the revelation that Grandpa Jingzhu was once a Midnight Ranger.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmph, I’m used to keeping a low profile. Bide my time to impress Linghan.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Make her fall in love with me with only one shot!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With my natural charm and these finely honed scythes, I’m confident this time I’ll win Linghan’s heart and let her accept my Noctemint!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem, absolutely!

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What makes Grandpa Jingzhu so sure that having a powerful Echo will win Grandma Linghan’s heart?

Dialogues.Speaker: Chixia
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I’m with you on this one. What makes Grandpa Jingzhu so sure that having a powerful Echo will win Grandma Linghan’s heart?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course, it’s not just the Echo I’ve prepared! Linghan once shared her criteria for an ideal partner.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She said her ideal partner is a wise and valiant soldier wielding a handsome greatsword, accompanied by a majestic Echo, facing countless foes with unrivaled poise.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You see? Apart from the majestic Echo, everything else fits me to a tee!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why the look? Do you lack faith in me? It’s understandable, given the generation gap between us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But when it comes to matters of love, especially for us seniors, trust me. I’ve got this!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, all set and ready. Let’s pay a visit to Linghan.
